pros: Mosaic makes a real difference for people in our community by offering quality healthcare for ALL. And that's not just a tagline, it really is true. Mosaic employees are truly dedicated to helping people live healthy lives, regardless of their situation.
cons: Because the organization has grown so quickly over the last few years (there are currently 15 clinics region-wide) it can be challenging to keep up with the workload and pace. Fortunately there is a strong emphasis on work-life balance, finding joy in our work and supporting one another.
